title: Luca_Blight
author: Luca_Blight
content: https://i.imgur.com/OeCzNph.pngHi guys!I would like to introduce you Higlan.com. It is a web platform where you can host cryptocurrency masternodes in a very easy way and cheap price! Right now we are working with 2 coins (PRCY and DAPS) and more coins will be added soon. So if you like masternode hosting, I highly recommend you to check it out and suggest your favorite masternode coin to us:https://higlan.com/nodes?coin_suggestion=1You may get some credits to test it out, you can dm on Telegram: https://t.me/lucablightHappy hosting!
